desc: LAVIDABEDS specialises in making high quality beds, mattresses and bedroom accessories, we do ottoman beds, our beds are fully bespoke, plush velvet fabric, high quality beds, we also have pocket sprung mattresses, full memory foam mattresses and other bedroom accessories such as footstools and ottoman boxes.

layout.text: We only use pictures sent by our own customers, so you can be 100% sure that you will get what you see!
